alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 8:35AM CST until March 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Illinois... Little Wabash River at Carmi. .Due to recent heavy rainfall, the Little Wabash River at Carmi is in minor flooding. It is forecast to slowly fall, dropping below flood stage next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wabash River at Carmi. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 29.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Wednesday March 16. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
